snippet: The choreographer Ronald K. Brown composes a work set to music by a single composer, Stevie Wonder.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews performance by choreographer Ronald K Brown and his company Evidence at the Joyce Theater.
lead_paragraph: The choreographer Ronald K. Brown composes a work set to music by a single composer, Stevie Wonder.

headline.seo: Ronald K. Brown and Evidence at Joyce Theater
headline.main: Finding Energetic Inspiration and Spiritual Infusion With One Composer
headline.print_headline: Finding Energetic Inspiration and Spiritual Infusion With One Composer
